articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: US, Japan, Australia and Philippines to hold South China Sea exercises amid rising tensions - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Amid rising conflicts regarding territory, US, Japan, Australia and Philippines announce a joint maritime activity on the South China Sea. | World News
articles.content: Defence forces of the U.S., Japan, Australia and the Philippines will conduct "maritime cooperative activity" on April 7 to support a free and open Indo-Pacific, the countries said on Saturday, amid … [+2089 chars]
